mapper.select: SELECT B_NO, B_TITLE, B_WRITER, TO_CHAR(B_DT, 'YYYY-MM-DD')AS B_DT FROM B ORDER BY B_NO DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO B(B_NO, B_TITLE,B_WRITER, B_CON) VALUES(B_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{bTitle}, #{bWriter}, #{bCon})
mapper.update: UPDATE B SET B_TITLE= #{bTitle}, B_CON = #{bCon} WHERE B_NO = #{bNo}
